sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios" import react, {useState,useEffect} from "react" const CountryInfo = ({country})=>{ const [weather,setWeather]=useState([]) const hook = ()=>{ axios.get(`http://api.weatherstack.com/current?access_key=0bcf1cc82c6ef26d96f0b36d146c06db&query=${country.name}`) .then(response=>{ setWeather(response.data) }) } useEffect(hook,[]) console.log(weather.current.temperature) return (

{country.name}

capital: {country.capital}

population: {country.population}

languages:
    {country.languages.map((language)=>{return
  • {language.name}
    • })}

Weather in {country.name}

{/* temperature:

{weather.current.temperature} Celcius

wind:

{weather.current.wind_speed} mph direction {weather.current.wind_dir}

*/}
) } export default CountryInfo;
